scenario_text.value: It really put me at ease.
It really put me at ease.

Because everyone relies on you, Aoi. You need
to stay strong.
Does that mean you’re relying on me a bit?

Hee hee, well, I’d like to have someone to
rely on myself.

But I guess I shouldn’t complain, huh? I need
to be strong.

When we first came to this world, I thought
it was all just a nightmare.

But now that I’ve spent some time here,
I have fond memories of the place.
Now...I really care about this world, too.

I want to protect it, from the bottom of my
heart.

(I see... So that’s the difference I felt
before.)

(Aoi’s gotten stronger while I was gone...or
maybe more brave. Incredibly brave.)
